description: This file defines React context and hooks for managing user authentication, favorites, and collections in a recipe application. It includes state management, effect hooks for session persistence, and functions for API interactions related to user actions.

methods.name: useApp()
methods.description: Hook to access the global app state and actions via React context.

methods.name: AppProvider({ children })
methods.description: React component that provides authentication state, favorites, collection management, and session persistence.

methods.name: signIn
methods.description: Async function to authenticate user and restore session, updating local storage.

methods.name: signUp
methods.description: Async function to register a new user and initialize session data.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Function to log out the user, clearing user data and local storage.

methods.name: toggleFavorite
methods.description: Async function to toggle a recipe as favorite, updating state and local storage.

methods.name: addToCollection
methods.description: Async function to add a recipe to user's collection, updating state and local storage.

methods.name: removeFromCollection
methods.description: Async function to remove a recipe from user's collection, updating state and local storage.
